author: Reece Williams
comment: Not only does it show Military Time (24 hour clock) it ALSO has an analogue watch face as well, for those who can not tell the time with 24 hour watches.

reply.author: MR.TIME LAB
reply.content:
Thank you for your purchase and feedback.
We are sorry for inconvenience you might have.
We will try to improve the watch face.
Thank you.

title: Brilliant clear watch

author: Pacco Simmons
comment: Just the watch i have been looking for

title: Only tell military time?
